about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION

This is an official romantic horror visual novel game created to celebrate the 10th anniversary of the character from 'Bloody Painter' and to give back to the fans for their support.

It is a spin-off based on the 2017 version of the story.

STORY

You have unfortunately been captured by a serial killer,

and you must increase your chances of survival within seven days.

Your choices will determine how he treats you and the outcome of your relationship.

What will your final relationship with him be...?

Will there be a change in the relationship between the killer and his prey?

CONTENT WARNINGS

．This game contains some graphic scenes of violence.

．If you encounter a murderer, please call the police first.It's unrealistic to develop a romantic relationship with a murderer.

．This is a romance game♥

FEATURES

．Fully voiced.

．There are a total of 14 CG illustrations.

ESTIMATED PLAY TIME

40 minutes for an good ending.

NUMBER OF ENDINGS

6 bad endings + 4 good endings.

STREAMING PERMISSION

Feel free to stream and play this game live! If you encounter any bugs, please leave a comment to let us know.

For players choosing the English language, it is recommended to go to settings and adjust the speed to the fastest.

OPERATING SYSTEMS

Windows 7 and above.

CREDITS

Development. Story. Programming by 迪鹿DeluCat @DeluCatOfficial

Graphics by 牛奶 @milk890522

Background Art by kurumi2179、迪鹿DeluCat

Logotype by サヤカ@laipeng16

Voice Acting by Easton@eastonandemmary

Trailer by ZAO@ZAO_Studio_

Font by 翰字鑄造 - TaipeiSansTCBeta-Regular

Special Thanks to 南翁、LoS-Light

Game Teste by 七七
